text: The 2016 Boys' Youth South American Volleyball Championship was the 20th edition of the Boys' Youth South American Volleyball Championship, organised by South America's governing volleyball body, the Confederación Sudamericana de Voleibol (CSV). ==Competing nations== The following national teams participated: * * * * * * ==Preliminary round== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the Semifinals |- |width=10px bgcolor=#dfefff| ||Qualified for the 5th–6th place classification |} ===Pool A=== |} |} ===Pool B=== |} |} ==Final round== ===5th–6th classification=== |} ===Championship=== ====Semifinals==== |} ====Third place match==== |} ====Final==== |} ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=180|Team |-bgcolor=#ccffcc |||align="left"| |-bgcolor=#ccffcc |||align="left"| |- |||align=left| |- |4||align=left| |- |5||align=left| |- |6||align=left| |- |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 2017 Youth World Championship |} ==References== ==External links== South American Volleyball Championship
title: 2016 Boys' Youth South American Volleyball Championship
